mapper.select: select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc, ciNo as id, ciName as text, uId from connection_info where uId=#{uId}
select ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc, ciNo as id, ciName as text, uId from connection_info where ciNo=#{ciNo}
insert into connection_info(ciNo, ciName, ciUrl, ciPort, ciDatabase, ciUser, ciPwd, ciEtc, uId) values (#{ciNo}, #{ciName}, #{ciUrl}, #{ciPort}, #{ciDatabase}, #{ciUser}, #{ciPwd}, #{ciEtc}, #{uId})

select table_name as tableName, table_comment as tableComment, (data_length+index_length)/1024 as tableSize from information_schema.tables where table_schema=#{dbName} and (table_type='BASE TABLE' or table_type='SYSTEM VIEW');

select column_name as cName, column_default as cDefault, is_nullable as nullable, data_type as dType, character_maximum_length as mLength, column_type as cType, column_key as cKey, column_comment as cComment from information_schema.columns where table_schema=database() and table_name=#{tName} order by ordinal_position;
